description: [NanoCore](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0336) communicates to its C2 over ports 6666 and 4782.(Citation: Unit 42 Gorgon Group Aug 2018)(Citation: PaloAlto NanoCore Feb 2016)

external_references.description: Falcone, R., et al. (2018, August 02). The Gorgon Group: Slithering Between Nation State and Cybercrime. Retrieved August 7, 2018.
Kasza, A., Halfpop, T. (2016, February 09). NanoCoreRAT Behind an Increase in Tax-Themed Phishing E-mails. Retrieved November 9, 2018.
